sentences.en: A harmonica band plays symphonies originally written for a 100– piece orchestra.
sentences.cn: 某个口琴乐队演奏原本是为有100首乐曲的管弦乐队而写的交响乐.

sentences.en: Adagio and Rondo for glass harmonica, flute, oboe, viola, and cello.
sentences.cn: 为玻璃乐器, 长笛, 双簧管, 中提琴, 与大提琴的慢版与轮旋曲.

sentences.en: But instead of the harmonica, he brought out the blanket.
sentences.cn: 但是他拿来的不是口琴, 而是那条毛毯.

sentences.en: He had just gone in to get Granddad's harmonica.
sentences.cn: 他进屋取来了爷爷的口琴.

sentences.en: He made a harmonica out of the corncob.
sentences.cn: 他把玉米棒子弄得象口琴一样。

sentences.en: In 1995, when the ban went into effect, the only instrument allowed in the Cumberland prison was the harmonica, but inmates who already had a guitar or electronic keyboard were allowed to keep them.
sentences.cn: 1995年该禁令实行后，坎伯兰监狱的囚犯们被允许拥有的乐器就只剩下口琴了，但在此之前已经有电吉他或键盘的囚犯被批准可以保留这些乐器。

sentences.en: My harmonica is a 24 hole one, and what is the difference?
sentences.cn: 不好意思, 我的也是24孔的.不知有何区别?

sentences.en: O rganized 5 N ational Harmonica Contests since 1990 until 1997.
sentences.cn: 1990年起至1997年筹办了共5届全国口琴比赛.

sentences.en: The harmonica concert at the Recital Hall at 3:00 pm on 11 - 10 - 2003.
sentences.cn: 2003年10月11日(星期六)下午三时在大会堂高座演奏厅的演奏会.

sentences.en: The harmonica is one of the oldest musical instruments.
sentences.cn: 口琴是最古老的乐器之一.

sentences.en: The King's Harmonica Quintet enlightened the opening ceremony with a musical performance.
sentences.cn: 英皇口琴五重奏为开幕礼顷力演出.

sentences.en: Then they called on Xiao Yang to play the harmonica.
sentences.cn: 然后他们请小杨吹口琴.

sentences.en: These people are the real opponents of the harmonica.
sentences.cn: 此类人是口琴的真正反对者.

sentences.en: This will enable you to determine how well you play the harmonica.
sentences.cn: 这使你能确定你能多好地演奏口琴.

sentences.en: This would be a unique and valuable contribution to the harmonica world.
sentences.cn: 这将是独一无二的,对口琴届来说也是很有价值的.

sentences.en: Thus, this section is geared toward the diatonic harmonica.
sentences.cn: 因此, 这个部分是与10孔口琴(演奏)有关联的.

sentences.en: Usually Gus would bring his harmonica and, after talking for a little while, they’d play a few songs together.
sentences.cn: 通常盖斯会带着他的口琴，在聊了一会儿以后，他们会一起演奏几首歌。

sentences.en: We are glad that you are enjoying the 10 hole harmonica.
sentences.cn: 能享受到10孔口琴的乐趣,那真是太棒了.

trans.tran_en: a small musical instrument that you play by blowing or sucking and moving it from side to side near your mouth
